items.name: Albumentations
items.description: a Python library for image augmentation used in deep learning and computer vision tasks to increase the quality of trained models. The purpose of image augmentation is to create new training samples from the existing data.

items.name: Anomalib
items.description: An anomaly detection library comprising state-of-the-art algorithms and features such as experiment management, hyper-parameter optimization, and edge inference.

items.name: Kornia
items.description: Kornia is a geometric computer vision Library for spatial AI library that allows classical computer vision to be integrated into deep learning models.

items.name: Lightly
items.description: LightlySSL is a computer vision framework for self-supervised learning.

items.name: OpenMMLab
items.description: Open-source computer vision algorithms and models.

items.name: PyTorch3D
items.description: PyTorch3D is a library of reusable components for deep learning with 3D data

items.name: raster-vision
items.description: Raster Vision is an open source library and framework for Python developers building computer vision models on satellite, aerial, and other large imagery sets (including oblique drone imagery). There is built-in support for chip classification, object detection, and semantic segmentation using PyTorch.

items.name: torchgeo
items.description: TorchGeo is a toolkit containing datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for geospatial data.

items.name: Clinica DL
items.description: open-source deep learning software for reproducible neuroimaging processing. It can be seen as the deep learning extension of Clinica, an open-source Python library for neuroimaging preprocessing and analysis.

items.name: FuseMedML
items.description: A python framework accelerating ML based discovery in the medical field by encouraging code reuse

items.name: GaNDLF
items.description: The Generally Nuanced Deep Learning Framework (GaNDLF) for image segmentation and classification, especially in the biomedical field.

items.name: MONAI
items.description: AI Toolkit for Healthcare Imaging

items.name: TIAToolbox
items.description: TIAToolbox is a computational pathology toolbox for pathology image analysis.

items.name: TorchIO
items.description: Medical imaging toolkit for deep learning

items.name: AllenNLP
items.description: An NLP research library, built on PyTorch, for developing state-of-the-art deep learning models on a wide variety of linguistic tasks.

items.name: Diffusers
items.description: Pretrained diffusion models for generating images, audio, and even 3D structures of molecules. Whether you are looking for a simple inference solution or want to train your own diffusion model, Diffusers is a modular toolbox that supports both

items.name: Flair
items.description: Flair allows you to apply our state-of-the-art natural language processing (NLP) models to your text, such as named entity recognition (NER), sentiment analysis, part-of-speech tagging (PoS), special support for biomedical texts, sense disambiguation and classification, with support for a rapidly growing number of languages

items.name: joeynmt
items.description: JoeyNMT is a minimalist neural machine translation toolkit for educational purposes.

items.name: Transformers
items.description: Transformers provides thousands of pretrained models to perform tasks on different modalities such as text, vision, and audio.

items.name: DGL
items.description: Python package built to ease deep learning on graph, on top of existing DL frameworks.  Fast and memory-efficient message passing primitives for training Graph Neural Networks.

items.name: PyTorch Geometric
items.description: Graph Neural Network Library for PyTorch

items.name: PennyLane
items.description: PennyLane is a cross-platform Python library for quantum computing, quantum machine learning, and quantum chemistry. Train a quantum computer the same way as a neural network.

items.name: TorchQuantum
items.description: A framework for Quantum Classical Simulation, Quantum Machine Learning, Quantum Neural Networks, Parameterized Quantum Circuits with support for easy deployments on real quantum computers.

items.name: GPyTorch
items.description: GPyTorch is a Gaussian process library implemented using PyTorch. GPyTorch is designed for creating scalable, flexible, and modular Gaussian process models with ease

items.name: NeMo
items.description: A scalable generative AI framework built for researchers and developers working on Large Language Models, Multimodal, and Speech AI (Automatic Speech Recognition and Text-to-Speech)

items.name: PyPose
items.description: PyPose is a library for Robot Learning with Physics-based Optimization

items.name: PyPOTS
items.description: a Python toolbox for machine learning on Partially-Observed Time Series
